name: Retrieving Release and Key Dates
description: Table of release versions with five critical dates: Feature Freeze, Code Freeze, Doc Freeze, Go/No Go, GA Announce
data_sources: Jira (jira list of active release query)
output_format: Table with dates and source link per release
instructions:
1. Execute 'jira list of active release' query to find active release issues
2. For each release issue, use get_issue() to retrieve full description
3. Extract critical dates from description
4. Format as table with release version and five dates
5. Include source Jira link for traceability

name: Retrieving Future Release and Key Dates
description: Table of future release versions with critical dates from release schedule spreadsheet
output_format: Table with dates and source link
instructions:
1. Access RHDH release schedule spreadsheet (ID: 1knVzlMW0l0X4c7gkoiuaGql1zuFgEGwHHBsj-ygUTnc)
2. Extract critical dates for future releases
3. Format as table with release version and five dates
4. Include spreadsheet link as source

name: Retrieve Active Release Status by Issue Type
description: Compile status of all active releases with open issue counts by type
data_sources: Jira (active release + open issues by type queries)
output_format: Table per release with issue type breakdown and links
instructions:
1. Execute 'jira list of active release' to get release versions
2. For each release, query open issues by type (Feature, Epic, Story, Task, Sub-task, Bug, Vulnerability, Weakness)
3. Use get_issues_stats() for each query
4. Create table showing counts per type with Jira links
5. Include total count across all types

name: Retrieve Teams and Leads
description: Structured list of all Active RHDH teams with leads and Slack handles
output_format: Table with Category, Team Name, Team ID, Leads, Slack Handles
instructions:
1. Access Team Value sheet in RHDH Team spreadsheet (ID: 1vQXfvID72qwqvLb17eyGOvnZXrZG7NBzTGv6RP9wvyM)
2. Filter rows where Status = 'Active'
3. Extract: Category, Team Name, Team ID, Leads, Slack Handles
4. Format as structured table
5. Include spreadsheet link

name: Retrieve Issues by Engineering Teams
description: Compile open issues for specific team ID
instructions:
1. Follow 'Retrieve Teams and Leads' to get active teams
2. Add 'AND team = {{TEAM_ID}}' to base query
3. Use get_issues_by_team() for accurate counts
4. Apply Summary format with total count and Jira link

name: Retrieve Blocker Bugs
description: Compile all open blocker bugs for a release
instructions:
1. Use 'jira list of open issues' as base
2. Add condition: 'AND issuetype=bug AND priority = blocker'
3. Use get_issues_detailed() for full details
4. Apply Detailed format with status, priority, assignee

name: Retrieve Engineering EPICs
description: Compile all open Engineering EPICs not in Dev Complete

name: Retrieve list of CVEs
description: Compile all CVE issues for a release

name: Retrieve outstanding Release Notes
description: Compile features and bugs missing Release Note Type
data_sources: Jira (Jira list of release notes query)
instructions:
1. Execute 'Jira list of release notes' query
2. Use get_issues_stats() for count
3. Apply Summary format with total and Jira link

name: Announce Feature Freeze Update
description: Slack message announcing Feature Freeze status update
data_sources: Jira (release issue, feature freeze query), Team spreadsheet
instructions:
1. Get Feature Freeze date from release issue
2. Get active engineering teams from spreadsheet (Category=Engineering, Status=Active)
3. Get outstanding release notes count
4. Use get_issues_by_team() with 'jira list of feature freeze issues' as base_jql
5. Fill Slack template with data
6. Return in code block (triple backticks) for copy-paste

name: Announce Feature Freeze
description: Slack message announcing Feature Freeze milestone reached
instructions:
1. Get open EPICs count
2. Get CVE issues count
3. Get outstanding release notes count
4. Fill Slack template with counts and links
5. Return in code block for copy-paste

name: Announce Code Freeze Update
description: Slack message announcing Code Freeze status update
data_sources: Jira (release issue, code freeze query, feature subtasks), Team spreadsheet
instructions:
1. Get Code Freeze date from release issue
2. Get active engineering teams
3. Get outstanding release notes count
4. Get feature subtasks count
5. Use get_issues_by_team() with 'jira list of code freeze issues' as base_jql
6. Fill Slack template
7. Return in code block

name: Announce Code Freeze
description: Slack message announcing Code Freeze milestone reached
data_sources: Jira (blocker bugs, feature demos, test day, open issues)
instructions:
1. Retrieve blocker bugs (detailed)
2. Retrieve feature demos count
3. Retrieve test day features count
4. Retrieve total open issues count
5. Fill Slack template with counts and links
6. Return in code block
